title: My new Pixel 3 was stolen from me when my home was broken into, am I eligible for a replacement?
content: My mother purchased me a new Google Pixel 3 for Christmas with my Google One subscriber coupon but during the robery I lost everything I had. Currently using an LG Aristo 2 as a back up phone from T-Mobile. No offense to LG but would I qualify for a replacement Pixel 3 despite having not purchased insurance for the stolen Pixel 3 phone?
